alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 7:30PM CDT until April 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OKLAHOMA COUNTY... At 729 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Oklahoma City, or near Nicoma Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Tinker Air Force Base, and Forest Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
